Class EqualizerView

java.lang.Object
musicApp.views.View
musicApp.views.settings.EqualizerView
public class EqualizerView extends View
This is the view for the Equalizer settings. It contains sliders for each band of the equalizer.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    static interface 
    EqualizerView.EqualizerViewListener
    Listener interface for handling events and retrieving configuration data for the equalizer.

    • initSliders

      private void initSliders()
      Initialize the sliders for the equalizer bands. Each slider is created with a VBox containing the slider, its value label, and frequency label.

    • sliderVBox

      private javafx.scene.layout.VBox sliderVBox(int sliderIndex)
      Create a VBox containing a slider, its value label, and frequency label.
      Parameters:
      sliderIndex - The index of the slider.
      Returns:
      A VBox containing the slider and its labels.

      public List<Double> getSlidersValues()
      Get the values of the sliders in the equalizer view.
      Returns:
      A list of doubles representing the values of the sliders.

    • updateSlidersValues

      public void updateSlidersValues()
      Update the values of the sliders in the equalizer view. This method sets the value of each slider to the corresponding value from the equalizer controller.
